refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns 1 or 0 indicating if the XML entity has been validated against the associated schema.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function returns the value of a special internal "is validated" flag of the given XMLType instance.

example.title: Sample use
example.para: These two calls demonstrate how the "is validated" flag can be set without making an actual validation in the call of XMLType constructor:
example.screen:
-- Line 75: select XMLType('<bad />', 'file://xmlschema/test0001/clean.xsd').isSchemaValidated() callret INTEGER _______________________________________________________________________________
0
1 Rows. -- 00000 msec.
-- Line 77: select XMLType('<bad />', 'file://xmlschema/test0001/clean.xsd'), 1).isSchemaValidated() callret INTEGER _______________________________________________________________________________
1
1 Rows. -- 00000 msec.
